title: (x) Blocky Vintage Book Cover Sans... - WPA Gothic {Florian}
content:
I've seen this before; have been unable to identify. First-time poster...thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025154556im_/http:/typophile.com/files/state%20by%20state_6455.jpg)
author: cameron@cameron...

comments.content:
Hi Cameron,  
that’s [WPA Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025154556/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/wpa_gothic) by an up-and-coming type designer named Stephen Coles.  
F
I think this is something by Chank. Liquorstore, or something...
